meanings.meaning: Evap vent valve has only one purpose. It closes in order to seal the vent so the EVAP system can pressurize and ensure there are no leaks. Evap vent valve is usually supplied Batt. voltage with key on. The ECM's driver controls the ground, and when grounded, activates the valve (closing it). If the ECM detects a short to ground, and open,or a short to battery voltage on the control circuit, P0446 will set. Code also may refer to ECM detecting that EVAP system is unable to achieve or maintain vacuum during test.

causes.cause: Open, short or excessive resistance on Vent valve control circuit

descriptions.description: Evaporative Emission Control System Vent Control Circuit Malfunction

solutions.solution: Repair open, or short, or resistance problem in power circuit
Repair open, short, or resistance problem in control circuit

symptoms.symptom: There will be no obvious symptoms to driver, other than MIL illumination.
